Albendazole is a broad-spectrum, synthetic benzimidazole-derivative anthelmintic (dewormer). The drug is not approved by the FDA because there are limited studies on egg residual concentrations in laying hens. It can be used off-label in pet chickens who are not producing eggs sold commercially ...
